thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ launched in India for Rs 57,900
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ launched in India for Rs 57,900 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ launched in India for Rs 57,900
text:
Other Articles Uphaar fire tragedy: Rich can get away by paying money, says victim Xiaomi launches upgraded operating system 'MIUI 7' in India DNA may used to build future computers Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ has been launched in India for a price of Rs 57,900 and it comes with dual curved screen like the earlier Galaxy S6 Edge. The Galaxy S6 Edge+ was recently launched by Samsung at its Galaxy UnPacked Event in New York, where the Galaxy Note 5 was also shown. Samsung Galaxy Note 5 has not yet been in launched in India.
The Galaxy S6 Edge+ has a 5.7-inch Quad HD Super AMOLED display at a pixel density of 518ppi. The Edge screen on the S6 Edge+ can now be used to pin five favourite apps along with contacts.
Running on Android 5.1 Lollipop OS, Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ is powered by an octa-core Exynos 7420 processor with 4GB of LPDDR4 RAM. The new smartphone comes in the 32GB variant option and Samsung has not yet launched the 64 GB version in India. There is no microSD card slot.
Samsung Galaxy S6 edge+ is expected to be the volume driver for the company.
The Samsung Galaxy Edge + is powered by 3,000 mAh battery.
On the camera front, the Galaxy S6 edge+ houses a 16MP OIS f1.9 rear camera along with a 5MP f1.9 front snapper. On the connectivity front, it comes with Bluetooth 4.2, Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, GPS/ A-GPS, and Micro-USB 2.0. It also has a fingerprint scanner.
The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+ measures 154.4×75.8×6.9 mm and weighs 153 grams.
 19, 2015 1:59 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
